headline: How CoStar’s Growing Homes.com Platform And CEO Recognition At CoStar Group (CSGP) Has Changed Its Investment Story
summary: In January 2026, Swanepoel Power 200 named CoStar Group founder and CEO Andy Florance among the top ten most powerful U.S. residential real estate executives, highlighting his role in building Homes.com into a rapidly expanding portal with AI-powered Smart Search and more than 26,000 members. At the same time, CoStar’s housing and hotel data, including Homes.com’s 2025 affordability report, underlines the company’s growing influence as a key information and marketplace provider across both...
